text: Is there a way to automatically add a redirect or let people redirect to a page if a published blogpost is unpublished?
Hi. Has anyone figured out an effective way to bulk replace files in the HubSpot files section with the same name? Only way I know of is manuallyâ€¦one by one. I hope there is a faster way?!
Is there any way to prevent emails from <mailto:noreply@notifications.HubSpot.com|noreply@notifications.HubSpot.com> going to the spam folder in the HubSpot inboxes?

Hey everyone! Just curious to hear all of your use cases for custom events? I would love to see how creative people have gotten with it especially with the new webhook trigger
